metadata.title: RZ/V: AI Partner: What kinds of applications are available?

sections.content:
Question:
What kinds of applications are provided as partner solutions?
Answer:
There is support for various applications that require AI using images. 
For example, support is possible for surveillance camera, marketing camera, room entrance and access control system, service robot, retail equipment.
Suitable Products
RZ/V
